description: Describe all the PPA Information included in the ZoneData object

___name.description: Human-readable local significant string. The name of this zone.

___usage.description: Enumeration describing the usage of the zone.

___terminated.description: Indicates whether the zone is currently terminated or not

$eref.description: Describe all the PPA Information included in the ZoneData object

___palId.description: List of one or more PAL Database record IDs.

___ppaExpirationDate.description: Date of the PPA expiration date, in format YYYY-MM-DD

___cbsdReferenceId.description: List of one or more CBSD Reference IDs in the cluster list of the PPA.

___ppaBeginDate.description: Date of the start of the PPA protection period, in format YYYY-MM-DD

___creator.description: Duman-readable local significant string. The name creator one of (SAS Administrator record ID , Static government zone definition source ID).

$eref.description: Schema for a Geo JSON object For SAS
$eref.title: Geo JSON object
